title: Recent Connection issues
body:
Just today I've been receiving a disconnection problem at the end of matches (ranked, aram, etc...) and it forces me to exit the client and re-open, which takes impossibly long. This hasn't happened before... so then I thought my computer may just need an update, which I did, and still no luck. I saw the update for the client and stats for 1/11/17 but I don't think it should effect todays game play. Is anyone else receiving any issues like this. It also happens in between champ select to the loading screen.

Thanks for your help! :)

replies.body:
I wasn't able to find a record of issues from our side within the last 24 hours on NA. It definitely sounds like there's something going on with your connection to our servers somewhere along the way. A good place to start troubleshooting this is by going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local network settings are compatible with League.

Should you still encounter these issues after working through that guide in its entirety, let me know so we can further troubleshoot this.
